description:
Doodle Jump is a simple yet addictive endless runner game. The player controls a small doodle character who must jump from platform to platform to avoid obstacles and reach the top of the screen. The game is procedurally generated, so the levels are always different.

The goal of the game is to see how high the player can jump. The player can jump by tapping the screen. The doodle character can also collect coins and power-ups to help them reach higher levels.

Doodle Jump is a great game for people of all ages. It is simple to learn but difficult to master. The game is also very addictive, so players will be coming back for more.

Tips for playing Doodle Jump:

  • Use the power-ups wisely. Power-ups can help the doodle character jump higher, reach further, or avoid obstacles.
  • Be careful not to fall into the gaps between platforms. Falling into a gap will end the game.
  • Collect coins to unlock new doodle characters and power-ups.
  • Try to reach the top of the screen without falling. The higher the player jumps, the higher their score will be.
name: Doodle Jump
